channel.title: Uboot on Yuanye Ma's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Uboot on Yuanye Ma's Blog

item.title: uboot
item.author: yuanye.ma@qq.com (Yuanye Ma)
item.description: uboot make xxx_defconfig Top Makefile : %config 依赖 scripts_basic $(Q)$(MAKE) $(build)=scripts/basic $(build) 定义在 scripts/Kbuild.include中 build := -f $(srctree)/scripts/Makefile.build obj 即 命令展开为 @ make -f $(srctree)/scripts/Makefile.build obj=scripts/basic 编译生成了 scripts/basic/fixdep outputmakefile FORCE 命令 $(Q)$(MAKE) $(build)=scripts/kconfig $@ 展开
